all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And if thou art faithful in keeping my commandments, thou shalt be lifted up at the last day. Amen.
Doctrine and Covenants 5:35
Quote of the Day
"We truly believe that we are all literally the children of God."
Rubén V. Alliaud | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
